Enterprise Offerings

At EC-Council, cybersecurity education is not mere knowledge transfer but the use of proven methods in all aspects of training– from content development to hands-on skill-development in labs to a proctored exam for certification.

Our trainings delves deep into the learning requirements of cybersecurity professionals worldwide to identify the challenges they face on job

Cyber career paths

When you become a certified professional you’ll unlock career growth in the cybersecurity industry. Employers, managers, and CEO’s are constantly on the look-out for professionals to deal with cyber threats on a day-to-day basis.

Whether you’re in private enterprise or a government organisation, the skills you’ll gain with an EC-Council certification are highly valued.

Find your own path with countless job opportunities waiting for you.

EC-Council was formed in 2001 after very disheartening research following the 9/11 attack on the World Trade Center. Founder and CEO of the EC-Council Group, Jay Bavisi, after watching the attacks unfold, raised the question, what if a similar attack were to be carried out on the cyber battlefield? Read More…
